alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Davison; Jerauld; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 1:17AM MDT until July 12 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Davison County in southeastern South Dakota... Southern Sanborn County in east central South Dakota... Northeastern Aurora County in south central South Dakota... Eastern Jerauld County in central South Dakota... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 217 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lane, or 21 miles north of Plankinton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Woonsocket and Storla around 230 AM CDT. Forestburg around 240 AM CDT. Letcher around 245 AM CDT. Loomis around 250 AM CDT. Mitchell around 255 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
